tool_description: Nutrifai food speech recognition API converts speech into nutrition facts using the most advanced AI technologies. API endpoints work asynchronously as it is using heavy ML processing for detection. For this purpose, you need to upload the audio file and query results by another endpoint.
name: Food Speech Recognition
title: Food Speech Recognition

api_list.name: Upload speech
api_list.description: Upload speech to be processed. You can get the result by calling the GET endpoint.
